mapper.select: SELECT ws.FNAME workshopName , data.FDATETIME datetime , data.FRTD_DATA rtdData , data.FSTATUS_DATA statusData , data.FDATA_PROTOCOL dataProtocol FROM T_HISTORY_DATA data JOIN T_WORKSHOP ws ON ws.FID = data.FWORKSHOP_ID WHERE ws.FCOMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND #{startTime} <= data.FDATETIME AND data.FDATETIME < #{endTime}
